description: Retrieves information about a state template.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the state template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the state template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the state template.

nested_items.name: signalCatalogArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the signal catalog associated with the state template.

nested_items.name: stateTemplateProperties
nested_items.description: A list of signals from which data is collected. The state template properties contain the fully qualified names of the signals.

nested_items.name: dataExtraDimensions
nested_items.description: A list of vehicle attributes associated with the payload published on the state template's MQTT topic.

nested_items.name: metadataExtraDimensions
nested_items.description: A list of vehicle attributes to associate with user properties of the messages published on the state template's MQTT topic.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time the state template was created in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: lastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The time the state template was last updated in seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the state template.
